metadata.title: USN-6543-1 -- GNU Tar vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that tar incorrectly handled extended attributes in PAX archives. An attacker could use this issue to cause tar to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6543-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  tar-scripts - 1.34+dfsg-1.2ubuntu1.1 tar - 1.34+dfsg-1.2ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
